plot: While working at his family's funeral home, Ronnie fantasizes falling in and out of love in the strangest of places. His moral grip on reality is soon lost when he falls madly in love with the beguiling Ophilia. Only he can decide if it's real and how it will end.
title: Ophilia
plot_es: While working at his family's funeral home, Ronnie fantasizes falling in and out of love in the strangest of places. His moral grip on reality is soon lost when he falls madly in love with the beguiling Ophilia. Only he can decide if it's real and how it will end.
